nodes.text: Hedrett Shipping and Investments was a company that operated in the Cularin system during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

The freighter Fricasseed Nerf was contracted to work for Hedrett Shipping and Investments. During the time of the Clone Wars, the ship was damaged because of faulty data supplied by the Comet Broom Service, so Hedrett Shipping and Investments hired the Heroes of Cularin to investigate the incident.

A short time afterward, the heroes prevented a comet from crashing into the planet Almas. A conference was held in the Forard Civic Center to discuss who had sent the comet and the Vice President of Hedrett Shipping and Investments attended the meeting.
